remarks: Change bound variables in a class substitution.  Interestingly, this does not require any bound variable conditions on ` A ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
cbvcsb.1 $e |- F/_ y C $.
cbvcsb.2 $e |- F/_ x D $.
cbvcsb.3 $e |- ( x = y -> C = D ) $.
cbvcsb $p |- [_ A / x ]_ C = [_ A / y ]_ D $.
